rukus.text: ql -ayha alrswl- liladhin kafaruu biallah wrswlh: ya 'ayuha alkafirun ballh
la 'aebud ma taebudun min al'asnam walalht alzayft
wla 'antum eabidun ma 'aebud min 'ilh wahd, hu allah rabu alealamin almsthq wahdah llebadt
wla 'ana eabid maa eabadtum min al'asnam walalht albatlt
wla 'antum eabidun mustaqbalaan ma aebd. whdhh alayat nazalat fi 'ashkhas baeyanhm min almshrkyn, qad ealim allah 'anahum la yuminun abdana
lkm dinakum aldhy asrrtm ealaa atbaeh, waliun diniin aldhy la 'abghi ghyrh
